articles.description: Ex-India cricketer Virender Sehwag was criticised once again by fans on Twitter on Day 4 of the ongoing fifth Test between India and England for his on-air comment on James Anderson
articles.content: A day after his controversial and rather offensive remark on former India skipper Virat Kohli, ex-India cricketer Virender Sehwag was criticised once again by fans on Twitter on Day 4 of the ongoing … [+2046 chars]

articles.title: New Zealand's female players get match-fee parity in new five-year deal - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Domestically and internationally the men and women will now be paid the same per match
articles.content: Sophie Devine on new deal: 'It's a massive step forward and will be a huge drawcard for young women and girls'  •  ICC via Getty
